attributes.action: Honour the 2021 planned elections, even if it entails all-postal voting.
attributes.additional_details: We believe that any further delay in holding these elections will result in a loss of belief in the democratic process by the people and provide civil unrest.
attributes.background: We want the Electoral Commission to make provisions for all-postal voting (on the assumption that Covid-19 restrictions will still be in place at that time) and then hold the elections that were postponed from 2020 as well as those due for 2021.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560718
